titles.title: Agricultural Commodity Export Expansion Act of 1993
To amend the Agriculture Trade Act of 1978 to promote and expand the export of agricultural commodities and products to foreign countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred jointly to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Foreign Agriculture and Hunger.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR H3865)

Mr. Berman asked unanimous consent that the Committee on Foreign Affairs be discharged from further consideration of the bill and the bill be rereferred to the Committee on Agriculture. Agreed to without objection.
Rereferred to the House Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 3/29/1993--Introduced. Agricultural Commodity Export Expansion Act of 1993 - Amends the Agricultural Trade Act of 1978 to revise restrictions for the agricultural export direct credit and credit guarantee programs.
